overview: From 2025-10-26 to 2025-11-02, elizaos-plugins/plugin-discord had 1 new PRs (0 merged), 0 new issues, and 4 active contributors.

topPRs.title: Discord slash commands interface, modal interaction enhancements, attachment fixes
topPRs.author: odilitime
topPRs.body:
<!-- CURSOR_SUMMARY -->
> [!NOTE]
> Adds dynamic slash command registration and modal handling, enables sending attachments in DMs/channels, and improves message/interaction processing with new exports.
> 
> - **Discord Service**:
>   - Introduces dynamic slash command system: `SLASH_COMMAND`/`MODAL_SUBMIT` events, `DiscordSlashCommand` type, `slashCommands` store, and runtime event `DISCORD_REGISTER_COMMANDS` to register/update app and guild commands.
>   - Enhances interaction handling: ensures connections for interactions and emits unified events (no automatic defer to allow ephemeral replies).
>   - Makes `clientReadyPromise` public/nullable; refines client init and logging.
> - **Messaging**:
>   - Enables sending attachments in DMs and channels by converting `Media` to `AttachmentBuilder` and passing to `sendMessageInChunks`.
>   - Improves reply reference resolution via `fetchReference`; refines permission checks and structured logging.
> - **Utils**:
>   - Widens `sendMessageInChunks` `files` type to accept `AttachmentBuilder`; attaches files on last chunk; safer component handling.
> - **Voice**:
>   - Updates callback signature in voice response handler.
> - **Exports**:
>   - Re-exports `DISCORD_SERVICE_NAME`, `DiscordService`, and `IDiscordService` from `index`.
> 
> <sup>Written by [Cursor Bugbot](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot) for commit 7fd4add1cc73f5c5b8780dd073aa16fe663d4029. This will update automatically on new commits. Configure [here](https://cursor.com/dashboard?tab=bugbot).</sup>
<!-- /CURSOR_SUMMARY -->

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **New Features**
  * Added slash command registration and handling capabilities
  * Introduced modal submission support for enhanced interactions
  * Added client readiness detection for better initialization tracking
  * Implemented channel permission management and access controls

* **Improvements**
  * Enhanced attachment handling in messages
  * Improved message reference resolution and context tracking
  * Better error handling and diagnostic logging during startup and runtime

* **Refactor**
  * Updated event types and payload structures for interactions

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
